name: The Village (itch) (PanzaDolphin56)
description:
My first attempt at a game with Bitsy, The Village lets you explore a small community isolated from the world just before our protagonist embarks on a journey outside the world he knows. Only short but I hope it's entertaining!

Made with Bitsy

Music: Tuin Me IonTe by Di Bos via Freemusicarchive.org

Added via: https://candle.itch.io/bitsy-audio
